short.ar: استمتع بالتواصل السريع والسهل مع WhatsApp and QuickChat.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Enjoy fast and easy communication with Whatsapp Privacy and QuickChat.
short.es: Disfrute de una comunicación rápida y fácil con Privacidad de Whatsapp y QuickChat.
short.es_419: Enjoy fast and easy communication with WhatsApp QuickChat.
short.fr: Profitez d'une communication rapide et facile avec Confidentialité WhatsApp et QuickChat.
short.lt: Goditi una comunicazione facile e veloce con Whatsapp Privacy and QuickChat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e: WhatsApp QuickChat is a Chrome extension that helps you send instant messages to WhatsApp. It has an easy-to-use interface where you can enter the recipient's phone number, write your message, and send it directly from the extension. It saves you time by providing an easy way to start a conversation without going through the normal WhatsApp process. Enjoy fast and easy communication with WhatsApp QuickChat.
long.en,en_AU,he,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,ro,ru,sk,sl,s: WhatsApp Privacy & QuickChat is a Chrome extension that helps you send instant messages to WhatsApp. It has an easy-to-use interface where you can enter the recipient's phone number, write your message, and send it directly from the extension. It saves you time by providing an easy way to start a conversation without going through the normal WhatsApp process. Enjoy fast and easy communication with Whatsapp Privacy and QuickChat.
